docs.snippet: Widespread memes used against African-Americans say America was built by Irish slaves whose history has been covered up. That’s false, historians say.

docs.snippet: A once-proud work force has seen its fortunes dwindle in Spain, where the government found it cheaper to import coal.

docs.snippet: While Billie Holiday’s short life was filled with hardship, Jerry Dantzic documented not the tragic torch singer of myth but a middle-aged woman finding simple comforts from the maelstrom.
